allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Process electron -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object Id, ProcessName, MainWindowTitle")
Bash(powershell -Command "Stop-Process -Name electron -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host ''Killed existing Electron processes''")

Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Process electron -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object Id, ProcessName, MainWindowTitle, @{Name=''Visible'';Expression={if ($_.MainWindowHandle -ne 0) {''Yes''} else {''No''}}}")

Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Process electron -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object Id, ProcessName, MainWindowTitle, @{Name=''Visible'';Expression={if ($_MainWindowHandle -ne 0) {''Yes''} else {''No''}}}")
Bash(powershell -Command "Stop-Process -Name electron,node -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host ''Killed existing processes''")
